data.text: @EveHart I know ! Surely clinical trials looking for those that haven't had it will be launched soon so I cam offer my services
@EveHart Let us know if we can do anything!
@EmmaDent76 I genuinely think this makes you last woman standing. Everyone else in the world has had it! x

@ErinMacT Oh that’s better news. Be gentle to yourself and take time to recover fully if you can 🤗 

Tom’s in bed all day, so it’s definitely not ‘like a cold’ here either. He could work with a cold, even if he stayed home to do so. He’s nowhere near able to work at the moment 😬

@EveHart Human again. Not 100% yet but not wanting to be read last rites anymore. We've had two versions - slow snotty burner (Dad and youngest) or kick you in the head from the start (Me and eldest). It's not   'like a cold' as they keep saying.
@EveHart Oh no hope he doesn't feel too rough
@EveHart I hope he is not hit hard by it, and recovers quickly.
